content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- European Soccer Events
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'europesoccer_demosynapsedls01') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [europesoccer_demosynapsedls01] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/europesoccer'
	)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'ext') 
	EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [ext]')
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [ext].[GameEvents] (
	[id_odsp] varchar(8000),
	[id_event] varchar(8000),
	[sort_order] int,
	[time] int,
	[event_type] int,
	[event_type_str] varchar(8000),
	[event_type2] int,
	[event_type2_str] varchar(8000),
	[side] int,
	[side_str] varchar(8000),
	[event_team] varchar(8000),
	[opponent] varchar(8000),
	[player] varchar(8000),
	[player2] varchar(8000),
	[player_in] varchar(8000),
	[player_out] varchar(8000),
	[shot_place] int,
	[shot_place_str] varchar(8000),
	[shot_outcome] int,
	[shot_outcome_str] varchar(8000),
	[is_goal] int,
	[location] int,
	[location_str] varchar(8000),
	[bodypart] int,
	[bodypart_str] varchar(8000),
	[assist_method] int,
	[assist_method_str] varchar(8000),
	[situation] int,
	[situation_str] varchar(8000),
	[country_code] varchar(8000),
	[time_bin] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'curated/game_events.parquet/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [europesoccer_demosynapsedls01],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO
